Package Circles.Model

Class DatabaseConn

java.lang.Object
Circles.Model.DatabaseConn
public class DatabaseConn extends Object
Class that handles the methods that requires database connection. Maintains singleton state.
Author:
Filip Svensson

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public static boolean registerUser​(String username, byte[] hash, byte[] salt)
      Registers a user in the database.

      Parameters:
      username - username to be added
      hash - hash generated from encryption algorithm
      salt - salt used to generate the hash
      Returns:
      returns true if registration is successful, otherwise false.

    • updateUserpass

      public static boolean updateUserpass​(String username, byte[] hash, byte[] salt)
      Updates a users password
      Parameters:
      username - name of the user
      hash - hash generated from encryption algorithm
      salt - salt used to generate hash
      Returns:
      returns true if successful, false if there was an error.

    • getHash

      public static byte[] getHash​(String user)
      Used to retrieve a users hash. Used during login to verify credentials.
      Parameters:
      user - username
      Returns:
      if successful it returns a byte array containing the hash, otherwise it returns null

    • getSalt

      public static byte[] getSalt​(String user)
      Used to retrieve a users salt. Used during login to verify credentials.
      Parameters:
      user - username
      Returns:
      If successfull it returns a byte array containing the salt, otherwise it returns null.

    • getUserMode

      public static boolean getUserMode​(String user)
      Retrieves the settings for the user.
      Parameters:
      user - username
      Returns:
      Returns the value of the darkmode setting as boolean, false by default if not successful.

    • setUserMode

      public static boolean setUserMode​(String user, boolean mode)
      Sets the settings for provided username
      Parameters:
      user - username
      mode - mode to be set
      Returns:
      returns a boolean with true or false if the change was successful or not.

    • getUserRating

      public static GradeComment getUserRating​(Circle c, User u, Movie m)
      Retrieve the rating given by a user for a movie
      Parameters:
      c - Circle that the movie belongs to
      u - User that is the author
      m - Movie rated
      Returns:
      returns GradeComment, null if not successful.

    • avgMovieScore

      public static GradeComment avgMovieScore​(Circle c, Movie m)
      Gets the average score for a given movie in a circle.
      Parameters:
      c - Circle that the movie belongs to
      m - Movie rated
      Returns:
      Returns a GradeComment object. Null if not successful.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Returns a GradeComment object. Null if not successful.

    • getAllMovieRatings

      public static LinkedList<GradeComment> getAllMovieRatings​(Circle c, Movie m)
      Retrieve all ratings for this movie
      Parameters:
      c - Circle that the movie belongs to
      m - Movie rated
      Returns:
      Returns a LinkedList consisting of GradeComment objects. Null if not successful.

    • addMovieReview

      public static boolean addMovieReview​(User U, Circle circle, Movie movie, int rating, String comment)
      Add a review for a movie in a circle
      Parameters:
      U - User that made the review
      circle - Circle that the movie belongs to
      movie - Movie in question
      rating - Given rating
      comment - Given comment
      Returns:
      Returns true if successful, false in all other cases.

    • isReviewed

      public static boolean isReviewed​(User U, Circle circle, Movie movie)
      Check whether a user has reviewed specified movie in this circle
      Parameters:
      U - User in question
      circle - Circle in question
      movie - Movie to check for reviews made by this user
      Returns:
      Returns true if requested review is found, false in all other cases.

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      c - Circles.Controller.Model.Circle to be added
      Returns:

      Returns:
      Returns the id as integer, -1 if not successful.
